meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Paul Belin Sabrina Fritz Jeff Crosby Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7273.

div.div: WE ASKED: TV host Rachel Maddow.

td.p: Paul Belin, a business development manager originally from Columbia, Maryland
Sabrina Fritz, an engineering student originally from St. Charles, Missouri
Jeff Crosby, a youth ministry consultant from Rochester, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $8,400)

tr.td: WELCOME TO
THE PEPYS SHOW
SPORT ABILITY
WE'LL SPOT YOU A LETTER
INTERNATIONAL CUISINE
(Rachel Maddow: I'm Rachel Maddow with a twist on a favorite feature of mine...)

td.a: THE BEST NEW THING IN THE WORLD

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Welcome to this Oregon city, population 600,000')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Welcome to this Oregon city, population 600,000

tr.td: Jeff
Sabrina
Paul
FICTIONAL HUNCHBACKS
3 LITTLE WORDS
THE HIMALAYAS
"R" HOTEL
(Alex: Each hotel beginning with the letter "R".)
THE WAR OF 1812
SHARED INITIALS

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_6_3', 'clue_DJ_6_3_stuck', '(Paul: What is M.G.?)
(Jeff: Who is Goodman?)
[Initially both ruled incorrect; before the Daily Double at clue 24, Alex explained that "Our judges are in a very good mood today, and they have decided, because of the confusion in that SHARED INITIALS category a few moments ago, they are not going to penalize you two for your incorrect responses."]
...
(Alex: Sabrina, you select.)
[Sabrina did not have control of the board, but the mistake went without being caught.]

Mark Goodson & Mikhail Gorbachev

Triple Stumper
')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
